metadata.title: CVE-2021-3979 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A key length flaw was found in Red Hat Ceph Storage. An attacker canexploit the fact that the key length is incorrectly passed in an encryptionalgorithm to create a non random key, which is weaker and can be exploitedfor loss of confidentiality and integrity on encrypted disks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3979` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
